product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Watch display
product.description: Distinguishes between watch displays, such as digital or analog

product.name: Connectivity technology
product.description: Defines the method of data transfer in a product, e.g. Bluetooth, USB

product.name: Smart watch features
product.description: Describes the capabilities of a smart watch, such as fitness tracker or waterproof

product.name: Case color
product.description: Specifies the color of a product's case, such as clear or white

product.name: Band color
product.description: Specifies the color of a watch band, e.g. multicolor, rose gold
